name: TheBrandingFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Where do you start with branding? It is so vital for your business, but just as overwhelming to get a grasp on.

This flash briefing is a convenient way to get a grip on what branding can mean for your company's longevity and growth.

Whose the host? Well, name is Jeffrey Maxim. I'm a 21 year old learning branding through interviews with business owners and brand strategists. In addition, each month I try a different brand strategy framework authored by an expert like Marty Neumeier, Julia Braga, Fabian Geyrhalter, etc. I ask experts very basic questions so you don't have to.

I started in May 2019 with no knowledge, and am steadily forming a concrete understanding of what branding can mean practically for a business. 

Find me on IG @ineyesight and LinkedIn at Jeffrey Maxim Listen to In EyeSight podcast on Spotify and other podcast platforms.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
